# AGENDA
`location` https://meet.jit.si/play

* ## 1. TASKS (for the week)

* ## 2. CHANGE PROPOSALS
  * > [ ] add2roadmap? [#XX ...](#link)

* ## 3. GENERAL

  * [ ] [ROADMAP](https://github.com/ethereum/play/milestones)
  * [ ] [SPECIFICATION](https://github.com/ethereum/play/issues/3)
